Breadth-First.Explanation: The model steps back from a single refined choice and explores multiple framing options for the final neighborhood label.

Depth-First.Explanation: The model proposes and confirms a specific location hypothesis based on known visual features.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesis that the image is the Long Room at Trinity College Library

Depth-First.Explanation: The model evaluates and selects among specific neighborhood labels to refine its location hypothesis.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Comparison of “College Green,” “Dublin City Centre,” and “Dublin 2”

Depth-First.Explanation: The model gathers detailed architectural evidence to verify the Long Room identification.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Barrel-vaulted oak ceiling with Corinthian columns

Depth-First.Explanation: The model uses the busts and Latin inscriptions as confirming clues for the Long Room.
The model identifies the unique suspended “Museum of the Moon” globe to support its location hypothesis.
The model presents its fully verified, finalized location statement.
Depth-First.KeyElement: College Green, Dublin City Centre, Dublin, Ireland, Europe

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After selecting “Dublin City Centre,” the model lacked full confidence and reverted to exploring alternate labels broadly.
Having reconsidered label options, the model returns to detailed evidence collection to reconverge on its hypothesis.
